title: Manyu-Wana 5 (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Aboriginal Australians - Language - Study and teaching

Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Language and languages - Study and teaching
description: Episode number 5 of Series "Manyu-Wana (A)". This episode covers the following topics: Holly magic; words for 'happy' and 'serious'; reading of a "Story about Echidnas"' number 8; story about a bush potato dreaming place; more on numbers, using doll magic; dreaming stories about places southwest of Yuendumu; boys and girls painted up and doing fire-dreaming dances; good food; bush animals, vegetables, fruits and seeds; working at the shop; bike magic. Suitable for Primary, Secondary and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with English subtitles.
